LanguageData.ArrestSuccessChance.label: Arrest success chance
LanguageData.ArrestSuccessChance.description: How effective this person is in arresting people. This affects chance that this person will be able to arrest someone without resistance.
LanguageData.BondAnimalChanceFactor.label: bond chance factor
LanguageData.BondAnimalChanceFactor.description: A multiplier on the chance to bond with an animal when interacting with it.
LanguageData.DrugSellPriceImprovement.label: drug sell price improvement
LanguageData.DrugSellPriceImprovement.description: When this person sells non-medical drugs, prices are improved by this percentage.
LanguageData.NegotiationAbility.label: negotiation ability
LanguageData.NegotiationAbility.description: How effective this person is as a negotiator.\n\nThis affects the speed of prisoner recruitment, impact on faction relations when giving gifts, and the outcome of peace talks.
LanguageData.PawnBeauty.label: beauty
LanguageData.PawnBeauty.description: How physically attractive this person is. This affects social interactions.
LanguageData.SocialImpact.label: social impact
LanguageData.SocialImpact.description: A multiplier on how much other people are affected by this person's social interactions.
LanguageData.TameAnimalChance.label: tame animal chance
LanguageData.TameAnimalChance.description:
The base chance this person will successfully tame an animal on any given attempt.

The actual chance is also affected by the animal's wildness.
Failed tame attempt can induce animal attacks, especially for more vicious animals.
LanguageData.TradePriceImprovement.label: trade price improvement
LanguageData.TradePriceImprovement.description: When this person acts as a trade negotiator, buy and sell prices are improved by this percentage.
LanguageData.TrainAnimalChance.label: train animal chance
LanguageData.TrainAnimalChance.description: The base chance this person will make progress training an animal on a given attempt.\n\nThe actual chance for a given attempt will also depend on the animal's wildness, whether it is bonded with the trainer, and so on.
